thread.title: United nations of spirits: What to sip wherever you travel
thread.title_full: United nations of spirits: What to sip wherever you travel

author: Editor
title: United nations of spirits: What to sip wherever you travel
text:
Last Slide Next Slide 
One of the most enriching reasons for travel is the experience of food and drink — whether it is the authentic or the undiscovered. Somehow, a crisp gin and tonic just tastes better in London like sake is better sipped in Japan. And uncovering Mamajuana in the Dominican Republic is one of the most interesting souvenirs from the trek. These beverages are so authentic, their hometowns made them the official booze. Here, a gallery of national spirits around the world and a few beloved bottles, so when in Rome, you’ll know exactly what to order. (Hint: It’s an Aperol Spritz.)
